title: Wallet
extract: A wallet is a small, flat case that can be used to carry such personal items as cash, credit cards, and identification documents, photographs, transit pass, gift cards, business cards and other paper or laminated cards. Wallets are generally made of leather or fabrics, and they are usually pocket-sized but not always foldable.
